website_summaries.verdict: The shoe possesses a name that is only fitting. This tour-ready piece is packed with different technologies that help arm the golfer with what they need on the turf and more. Wearers specifically noticed a huge difference with its comfort, craftsmanship, support, and stability. It is no wonder that the majority claimed that they would recommend this item.
pros: Many users claim that the Footjoy Tour S provides the right balance of comfort and performance
The comfort of this Footjoy golf shoe is the next level
It feels as if it has been broken-in for a long time
Several consumers like the wide set of cleats because it grips the ground
Plenty of users attest to this trainer’s stability
It improves the stance and prevents the foot from shifting on the inside when doing a swing
Though its price is a bit steep, a high number of reviewers find that it is worth it
Some testers claim that it is durable and well-made
cons: Several commenters have experienced issues with the laces
They do not stay tightly tied, and some had encounters with the eyelets ripping
A couple of commenters complain about the spikes falling off during play

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is narrow...
customer_reviews.text: These run a little bit large and the toe box is definitely not generous. That being said, the shoes were immediately comfortable to walk and play in, but 1/2 size down would have probably worked a bit better for me. Great looking shoe and the platform is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Podqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first pair. Upper portion of the tongue on right shoe tore off when putting them on. A replacement pair was shipped immediately and so far they have been a great shoe. Whether or not the first pair had weak stitching or I pulled too hard putting them on, I don’t anticipate having the issue ever again and thus am very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dumptruck9

customer_reviews.title: Tongue torn in 4 months of owning.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes only lasted about 20 times out and then part of the tongue torn off on it. Didn’t even last 4 months. I would not recommend buying this model.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Huelskamp

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Good shoe. Good cleats
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size matched up with my running shoes well. 11.5 4E normal shoes and these work well. Played a few rounds already in very wet grass and havent noticed any water in my shoes. Look great and thr cleats feel good in the turf. Very happy. Looking forward to many more rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Proc N

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size to a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave 2 starts is because I never wore them. They were way to large out of the box. I read a lot of people saying this but I didn't listen...should have. Always been a 8.5 in all Foot Joys as well a 8.5-9.0 in most other shoes. Thinking I might lust go back to the classic dry joys at 8.5 and be done...it's a GREAT shoe but a lil pricey. Hope this helped...order small or return them like I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. FJ, shoes are (for me) the best shoes for the money. A little more expensive, but worth it. I have 2 pair and rotate them as I play 2 to 3 times weekly.
customer_reviews.author: scraig

customer_reviews.title: The possible defect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair,after returning the previous pair because a cleat broke after one day of use and the second pair has the same cleat in the same location that has broken on the shoe after only two days of use. I will be returning this second pair shortly.
customer_reviews.author: rick woulfe

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit large so I always order a 1/2 size smaller. Got these and for the waterproof outer material, solid base and replaceable cleats. I play golf 6x a week and I rotate this shoe and another every other day. High quality and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Durand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! Plays golf a least once a week and never complains about his feet. True to size and best support
customer_reviews.author: Dana Skolaut

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe made.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best shoes produced by foot joy. Very comfortable and really is waterproof. My feet don’t hurt after walking 18 to 36 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Doland Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: I have not warn them to golf yet but next month traveling to Florida . They seem comfortable though and I expect they will be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as promised in perfect (new) condition. The shoe fits perfectly (runs identical to other FJ golf shoes) and very comfortable. Traction as excellent and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Harold P. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Footjoys I have had. They do tend to run a little narrow but I ordered 10.5W and they are perfect! Very stable shoe! Have already played 3 rounds in them! No breakin at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: True to fit
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe fits good. Toe box is slightly narrow but seemed to stretch out during first round of play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at discounted price
customer_reviews.text: Like the stability, where the spikes align to the balls of my feet, lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these new golf shoes. They kept his feet dry on the wet grass and look sharp
customer_reviews.author: mom to 2 boyz

customer_reviews.title: Joy for the Foot
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits great! They give me better stability when hitting the ball. Very glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: J Matar

customer_reviews.title: Another great foot joy product
customer_reviews.text: Foot joy continues to impress me. Right out of the box ready to wear. No break in period necessary. Great grip out of them as well
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Should I return them?
customer_reviews.text: I used the shoes for the first time today. And When I was done I was missing 4 spikes. Should I return them or can you get footjoy to send me bee spikes?
customer_reviews.author: dennis giordano

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed so far. Great looking shoe and will get you compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Foot joy always fits and size is always true. Never know about other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit - this shoe immediately improved my golf game!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very hard sole shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My pevious pair of FJ Originals where far more comfortable. On these the hard plastic sole gives no cushion and spike plate extend wider than the foot print/tread and so every once in a while I clip myself with a spike in the ankle as Im walking along and it hurts. These shoes run narrow size wise. Im wearing a half size larger than I normally wear and they still pinch the little toes. Although they are like torture devices on my feet they are great as far as power transfer and stability through the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: broken eye hole
customer_reviews.text: the top eye hole to lace your shoe will break it is made of cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: raymond rocha

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe on the market
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe if you walk. These shoes have tremendous arch support and are worth the money. I have 2 pair and rotate them. Trust me, after walking 18 with these shoes, your feet will love you. They also perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and water tight FootJoy golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe right out of box. Wet grass in 39 degree weather and not a drop made it through. Really comfortable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S.

product_meta.title: Footjoy Men's Tour S Golf Shoes
feature_bullets: Proprietary Pebax Powered Chassis by Arkema
Carbon Fiber Heel Cup and Outsole Plate
